notes_display: Obverse: legend IC XC; three pellets below XC and one to right of throne; one pellet to left of throne, one to lower right of throne, and one to right of XC   reverse:ΘEOΔΩPOC on left, X M vertically to lower right
issue_obverse_figure_description_s: Christ, bearded and nimbate, wearing tunic and kolobion, seated upon throne without back; r. hand raised in benediction, holds Gospels in l. Pellet normally in each limb of nimbus cross.
issue_reverse_figure_description_s: Full-length figure of emperor on l., and of archangel Michael nimbate, giving a castle with three towers to the emperor. Emperor holds labarum-headed scepter in r. hand. Saint holds jeweled scepter in l. hand. Manus Dei in upper center field.
